text: Desnoyers is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Adam Desnoyers, American writer *Auguste Gaspard Louis Desnoyers (1800–1887), French engraver *Daniel Desnoyers, Canadian radio host and DJ *Jules Desnoyers (1800–1887), French geologist and archaeologist *Luc Desnoyers (born 1950), Canadian politician *Peter J. Desnoyers (1772–1846), Detroit silversmith and businessman *Peter Desnoyers (1800–1880), Detroit businessman and politician ==See also== *Charles Desnoyer (1806–1858), French actor, playwright and theatre manager
title: Desnoyers
